changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE EDITIONABLE VIEW DOCAI_DOCUMENT_CATEGORY_HIERARCHY_V AS SELECT category_id, LTRIM(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(REPLACE(category_name,'>', '~'),'>'),'>') AS category_path, category_name, category_description, active_ind, parent_category_id, handling_procedure, seq_num, LEVEL AS lvl FROM( SELECT category_id, category_name, description AS category_description, parent_category_id, handling_procedure, active_ind, seq AS seq_num FROM docai_document_category WHERE 1=1 AND deleted_ind != 'Y') CONNECT BY PRIOR category_id = parent_category_id START WITH parent_category_id IS NULL /
